track.name: Colomb
comments: parlez francais! non! cant but love this song. makes things easier

- Espérez !
- Plus d’espérance !
-Trois jours,﻿ leur dit Colomb, en montrant le ciel immense.
- Mouchette !
- Le fond de l’horizon.
- Trois jours et je vous donne un monde, à vous qui n’avez plus d’espoir.
- Sur l’immensité profonde (Non présent dans le morceau), ses yeux s’ouvraient pour le voir.
- Mouchette !

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Hope!
- No more hope!
- Three days, their said Columbus, by showing the vast sky.
- Mouchette!
- The bottom of the horizon.
- Three days and I will give you a world, to you who haven't hope anymore.
- On the deeply immensity (not in the track), his eyes opened to see it.
- Mouchette!

Yeah, it's so cool to hate on so called 'auto tune' when people don't know what it is... 
Great track, its hauntingly beautiful

lol @ people bitching about the vocals in this track. if you didn't listen to so much shitty hip hop you wouldn't be complaining about them and would have some objectivity. now go back to soldya boy and other shitty music that doesn't utilize vocal effects properly.
I feel the sound of this song is in the air while listening. This is epic.

Oh, by the way, the lyrics are sampled from a Robert Bresson movie called Mouchette. And the lyrics are "-Espérez! -Plus d’espérance! -Trois jours,﻿ leur dit Colomb, En montrant le ciel immense, Le fond de l’horizon. Trois jours et je vous donne un monde, vous qui n’avez plus d’espoir. Sur l’immensité profonde, ses yeux s’ouvraient pour le voir"
It's perfect the way it is. Period.
